result.eng: Is there anything happening?

result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil a ḋaṫ ar siúlIs there anything happening?

result.eng: On Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.
result.ga: ar chomhairle thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin
result.orig: ar chomhairle thomáis aontaíodh gan aon rud a rá leis na meáin

result.ponchtml: ar ċoṁairle ṫomáis aontaíoḋ gan aon rud a rá leis na meáinOn Thomas's advice it was agreed not to say anything to the media.

result.eng: Would you like anything else?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat aon rud eile
result.orig: ar mhaith leat aon rud eile
result.html: ar mhaith leat aon rud eileWould you like anything else?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat aon rud eileWould you like anything else?

result.eng: Have you ordered anything?
result.ga: ar ordaigh tú rud ar bith
result.orig: ar ordaigh tú rud ar bith
result.html: ar ordaigh tú rud ar bithHave you ordered anything?
result.ponchtml: ar ordaiġ tú rud ar biṫHave you ordered anything?

result.eng: Slim chance she will find anything there.
result.ga: beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.orig: beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansin
result.html: beag an baol go n-aimseoidh sí rud ar bith ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.
result.ponchtml: beag an baol go n-aimseoiḋ sí rud ar biṫ ansinSlim chance she will find anything there.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge.
result.ga: dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amach
result.orig: dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amach
result.html: dhéanfadh sé rud ar bith chun díoltas a bhaint amachHe would do anything to take revenge.
result.ponchtml: ḋéanfaḋ sé rud ar biṫ ċun díoltas a ḃaint amaċHe would do anything to take revenge.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: She will accept anything you tell her.
result.ga: glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi
result.orig: glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léi
result.html: glacfaidh sí le rud ar bith a deir tú léiShe will accept anything you tell her.
result.ponchtml: glacfaiḋ sí le rud ar biṫ a deir tú léiShe will accept anything you tell her.

result.eng: Don't buy anything!
result.ga: ná ceannaigh rud ar bith
result.orig: ná ceannaigh rud ar bith
result.html: ná ceannaigh rud ar bithDon't buy anything!
result.ponchtml: ná ceannaiġ rud ar biṫDon't buy anything!

result.eng: Don't change anything, you are perfect.

result.html: ná hathraigh aon rud tá tú foirfeDon't change anything, you are perfect.
result.ponchtml: ná haṫraiġ aon rud tá tú foirfeDon't change anything, you are perfect.

result.eng: I didn't get anything.

result.orig: ní bhfuair mé faic
result.html: ní bhfuair mé faicI didn't get anything.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair mé faicI didn't get anything.

result.eng: I don't remembr anything.

result.html: ní cuimhin liom tadaI don't remembr anything.
result.ponchtml: ní cuiṁin liom tadaI don't remembr anything.

result.eng: She didn't do anything.

result.orig: ní dhearna sí tada
result.html: ní dhearna sí tadaShe didn't do anything.
result.ponchtml: ní ḋearna sí tadaShe didn't do anything.

result.eng: She didn't take anything for granted.

result.orig: ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bith
result.html: ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bithShe didn't take anything for granted.
result.ponchtml: ní ḋearna sí talaṁ slán de rud ar biṫShe didn't take anything for granted.

result.eng: I can't promise anything but I'll do my best.

result.eng: The sentence does not mean anything.
result.ga: níl ciall leis an abairt
result.orig: níl ciall leis an abairt
result.html: níl ciall leis an abairtThe sentence does not mean anything.
result.ponchtml: níl ciall leis an abairtThe sentence does not mean anything.

result.eng: He isn't interested in anything except beer and women.
result.ga: níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mná
result.orig: níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mná

result.ponchtml: níl suim aige in aon rud seaċas beoir agus mnáHe isn't interested in anything except beer and women.

result.eng: I can't hear anything now.

result.eng: Do you need anything else?

result.html: an bhfuil aon rud eile uaibhDo you need anything else?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil aon rud eile uaiḃDo you need anything else?

result.eng: Is there anything you are not interested in?

result.orig: an bhfuil rud ar bith nach bhfuil suim agat ann
result.html: an bhfuil rud ar bith nach bhfuil suim agat annIs there anything you are not interested in?

result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ga: tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.orig: tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.html: tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: tá sé de ḃua ag an scéal naċ féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.

result.eng: I couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.
result.ga: ní fhéadfainn rud ar bith a chloisint ag sodar an chapaill
result.orig: ní fhéadfainn rud ar bith a chloisint ag sodar an chapaill

result.ponchtml: ní ḟéadfainn rud ar biṫ a ċloisint ag sodar an ċapaillI couldn't hear anything for the horse's trot.

result.eng: I looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ga: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.orig: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseo
result.html: d'fhéach mé go grinn ag iarraidh cor a fheiceáil cor beag ar bith an mise an t-aon neach beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?
result.ponchtml: d'ḟéaċ mé go grinn ag iarraiḋ cor a ḟeiceáil cor beag ar biṫ an mise an t-aon neaċ beo anseoI looked closely to see if anything was moving, anything at all. Am I the only living creature here?

result.eng: In the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ga: i saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.orig: i saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith

result.ponchtml: i saol dorċa na spiaireaċta ní féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte de rud ar biṫIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.

result.eng: He had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ga: ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.orig: ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.html: ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ bríste nó a ḋaṫ san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.

result.eng: He would put up with anything for her.

result.orig: d'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsa
result.html: d'fhulaingeodh sé rud ar bith ar a sonsaHe would put up with anything for her.

result.eng: He would never do anything to hurt her.

result.orig: ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.html: ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.

result.eng: There's no point saying anything.
result.ga: níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.orig: níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.html: níl gar a bheith ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
